author: Nitin Tiwari
title: Machine Learning on the browser: TF Lite meets TF.js
description: This blog post showcases the implementation of real-time object detection through the deployment of a TF Lite model on a web browser using the TF.js-TFLite API. The content includes a practical example illustrating the identification of various waste categories, including open litter, plastic waste, biodegradable waste, medical waste, and an overflowing dustbin.
